message.body: did u avoid watching the blind race?
u should only open the game on stream if so
this is voiced by the original guy voice actors
this is a real game that exists yeah
ganbare goemon 2 is the name of the game
yeah this is based on a level from goemon 2
all of this is a tribute to the original game
all the stages basically stay as true as they could be to the source games
Hey echo :) gl today, hope you are doing well
the theme is games we think are Cool
and we are indeed fortnite gamers
this is the same game yah
kousaku drew most of the original graphics
yo nice, ive been waiting for your playthrough of this
hello and welcome people, renexify here

it just uses the has gem key for the whole thing

My mans finally playing this! alexth9Pog
I'll come back in an hour. Need to make some food
in ur defense, i also got stuck here during testing
the slope used to be smaller but then literally everyone got stuck during testing so we made it bigger
thats one way to do it
this run is on some crazy pace
yeah this is going fast i thought i could get breakfast and not miss lit. half of wario
nah they do the double hit on speedruns
plus yeah this is faster than the average playthrough
chest means you are taking too long so no more bonus for you
i thought that was intentional honestly
its not, it loops at around 4 min
he's always had restarting music lmao
i thought it was on purpose
well damn color me green and call me renex
the chests were time bonuses by the way
holy shit thats a fast goemon
i can't believe they stole from i wanna be the idolmaster...
i added that like 2 days before release lol
it's a really confusing 3d collision engine
it's a path that follows along the 3d backgrounds
for the most part it's 2d but there's a path tracing the "top-down" path
and then we just draw a model over it lol
the collision is just blocks and slopes
oh yeah and then i move it all to like 4 billion so it jitters like a ps1 game
gonna be honest i can't even see the jitter lol
the most complicated thing i contributed to klonoa was the 16 bit dithering effect on the screen
we almost didnt have that in the game cause we thought it might destroy stream quality
and then we put a bunch of other things in the game that *definitely* destroy stream quality lmao
i mean this is generally regarded as the hard room im pretty sure
a fair amount of people take a bit here
!! Have fun Ech of Mask eevaxHi
its telling you up arrow key
You jumped, but you needed to Jump
this one is also my favorite
because of how funny the lyrics are
this ties with stage 5 for me
klonoa is the most impressive though
actually I don't emember which one it was
ok yeah I meant the one after this
yeah this game is the winner of Fangames
a month before release we were like "damn rocket knight ain't working out what do we do"
it wasn't a month, it was like
and also finished the rest of the game
it's the nogun sprite from catch the clown
The blue creature is no more!
all of this is from sonic
sonic cd is built really interesting
the stages are made of these 256x256 "macro blocks" of tiles
you can just puzzle together a whole room in a few minutes
yeah 2D sonic tiling in general is composed of chunks
there's a 32x32 block that we add for decoration and connection yeah
if you load the room editor and turn the grid on, you'll see a couple of chunks that are the exact same
this game is simply never predictable
we didn't have much time to add secrets
there's a funny easter egg in sonic cd that is impossible to guess unless you've played the original
and then theres people like me who hear the big chungus refrain in this song
It's not called CD for no reason
Killed by a crippled enemy LUL
wtf erik, he was just offering free follows man
it's a real shame sega took sonic cd off from steam
play it on xbox 360 instead lmao
if you wanna play sonic cd nowadays you have to buy an overpriced collection
we contacted the original IWBTG voice actor and asked him "hey can you do monkey ball noises, klonoa noises and also rap like parappa?"
I like how you're also mimicking kid's voice when you're about to roll off LUL
would you eat at burger cube
or would you prefer rock 'n roll diner
i think i'd eat at burger cube out of these three
imagine being able to say that you ate at burger cube
i love the voice acting in this
i forgot to put bananas in conveyors
getting over it with paul makaris
me trying to climb the social hierarchy
there are like a billion different ways we've seen people clear this screen
i didn't know he could slam the sides
roll now the exact numbers again
the star orbs are just points
almost like the green weapon from cuphead
flamethrower is not very good on 2nd phase
ayy i got back in time for gunstar clear
little a bonk, as a treat
See that thing in front of you? That's a switch! Just run into it to make something COOL happen!
you are just missing it yeah
many got stuck here for a while
Woooah, look!! An ARROW! Aren't these game designers wonderful?!
the way how the potrait lies at the end screws up my head
What would a platform game be without platforms?!
you might be the first one i saw finding that secret on their first playthrough
u just got like 6 heart attacks 2 screens in a row
puts a tear to my eye
did you guys increase the timer"
think that's for whenever the next update is
thank you so much for playing
Congrats man, I'm glad you came around playing this.
renko's pfp is stocking, natsu's pfp is konata
the better your score, the better your prize!
endings are determined by your score
suprised you managed to do a blind playthrough
thought you'd see the blind adventure race or smthn
at the bottom of the main menu there's extras
nah you have to replay the game
you gotta do a new game to get a different ending
achievements are shared through saves, however the ending u only get in a specific save
u can just still and shoot on melon bread lmao
parappa's scoring system rewards not just following what onion says and coming up with more interesting rhythms
imagine monkey ball in brutal mode
freestyle as much as u want
to some degree if u want
brutal mode is surprisingly doable, everyone who cleared it so far spent like a day or so on it
natsu cleared it before the release
u can go crazier than that...
look at your score go crazy
now try spamming as hard as u can
depending on what you do, you can lose score
yeah u need to kinda know what youre doing to actually lose score
its p easy to just freestyle and gain a bunch
im glad u finally played it
please look forward to the team's future projects
everything they do and touch is fucking incredible
it was our first original adventure game
but this was our first Real Game as a group
it's also a celebration of 15 years of og IWBTG
he literally considered it the sequel
he watched the blindrace during fangame marathon
we showed it to him when we were getting in touch for the voice acting
he was like "now when people ask me about iwbtg 2 i can go look i don't have to"
